description: snowy scene; faint image of police car with headlights on in center; faint suggestion of figure standing to left of car
provenance: The artist, Minnesota; (Burnet Fine Art & Advisory, Wayzata, Minn.), sold to MIA, 2019.
signed: on back, in center, in pencil: Joshua Huyser 2016
text: Joshua Huyser’s landscapes often strike a balance between abstraction and representational art. In Whiteout, a police car and officer appear as blobs on the horizon, a familiar sight to any resident of the wintry north. With the snowy haze and flashing lights, he captures the anxiety, confusion, and danger of driving through a blinding snowstorm, and nature’s sublime vastness is palpable in a work about the size of a sheet of letterhead paper.
title: Whiteout (police car with figure)
